description: An intelligent MySQL MCP Server with expert data analytics capabilities and comprehensive caching. Goes beyond basic querying to provide in-depth database analysis, relationship mapping, and user behavior insights with high-performance caching system.

tools.name: mysql_query
tools.description: Execute a read-only SQL query against MySQL databases. Supports SELECT, SHOW, DESCRIBE, and EXPLAIN statements.

host.description: Optional host name to connect to (defaults to "default" host)

query.description: The SQL query to execute (read-only operations only). Use database.table syntax for cross-database queries.

params.description: Optional array of parameters for prepared statement

database.description: Optional database name to connect to for this query

tools.name: mysql_schema
tools.description: Get comprehensive schema information including tables, relationships, constraints, and data patterns.

host.description: Optional host name to connect to (defaults to "default" host)

table.description: Optional table name to get specific table analysis (use database.table for cross-database)

database.description: Database name to analyze (if not specified, analyzes current/default database)

sample_size.description: Number of sample rows to analyze (max 1000)

include_sample_data.description: Include sample data and value distributions

include_relationships.description: Include foreign key relationships and table connections

tools.name: mysql_analyze_tables
tools.description: Analyze table relationships and suggest optimal query patterns for user behavior analysis.

host.description: Optional host name to connect to (defaults to "default" host)

tables.description: List of table names to analyze for relationships

tools.name: mysql_inventory
tools.description: Get comprehensive inventory of all configured MySQL hosts and their accessible databases.

host.description: Get inventory for specific host only (omit for all hosts)

refresh.description: Force refresh of host inventory by re-scanning all hosts

tools.name: mysql_cross_host_query
tools.description: Execute queries across multiple MySQL hosts and combine results for comprehensive analysis.

host.description: Host name to execute query on

queries.description: Array of queries to execute across different hosts

combine_strategy.description: How to combine results: separate (individual results), union (merge similar data), comparison (side-by-side), correlation (find relationships)

tools.name: mysql_discover_analytics
tools.description: Intelligently discover and analyze database structure with expert data analytics insights. Use summary mode first for large servers.

host.description: Optional host name to connect to (defaults to "default" host)

databases.description: Optional list of databases to analyze (if not specified, discovers all accessible databases)

page_size.description: Number of databases to analyze per page (default: 5, max: 10)

focus_area.description: Analytics focus area to guide discovery

detail_level.description: Level of detail: summary (overview only), detailed (without sample data), full (everything)

max_tables_per_db.description: Maximum number of tables to analyze per database (default: 20)

sample_data_limit.description: Maximum sample rows per table (default: 3, max: 10)

include_recommendations.description: Include expert analytics recommendations and queries
